Key Match Events: The Guardians scored 5 runs with no outs in the first inning
Ty Madden's appearance fell apart with three walks and Fry's two-out, two-run double
Post-Match Reflections: A.J. Hinch mentioned that the Tigers have a pretty good counterpunch with Tarik Skubal looming for Game 2 of the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers' pitching chaos worked splendidly during an AL Wild Card Series sweep of Houston to get them to the ALDS
Others: The Guardians manager Stephen Vogt was forced to lift lefty reliever Tim Herrin due to a double switch by Hinch, which resulted in Hunter Gaddis being brought in
